title: Create Slide Deck for Medical Conference
description: An MSL needs to create a slide presentation summarizing recent clinical trial data for an upcoming medical conference.

tasks.description: Retrieve the final clinical study report and statistical analysis plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully gathers the source documents for the presentation.

tasks.description: Extract the key efficacy and safety data points to be presented.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the primary endpoint results and key secondary endpoints to highlight.

tasks.description: Create a slide deck using a corporate template, including graphs and tables of the key data.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent populates the slide deck, ensuring all data is accurately represented and properly sourced.

tasks.description: Submit the slide deck for internal promotional review to ensure compliance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent submits the deck to the promotional review committee.
